en: I am a software developer that builds efficient and scalables solutions such as desktop, mobile and web-based applications, implementing attractive and responsive designs to web clients.
I started as a hobby game developer around of 2013 year, building fangames of "I Wanna Be The Guy" with Game Maker.
Finally, I got my first real experience as freelancer at 2023 year developing a web platform for a banking correspondent, growing as software developer and improving my skills.
